text: masjidul harām (hevat śuddha dēvasthānayen) hā ran̆davā tabanu læbū satva kæpayan ema sthānayaṭa ḷan̆gā vīmen num̆balā va væḷækvūyē pratikṣēpa kaḷavun vana ovuhumaya. num̆balā nodannā viśvāsa karana pirimin hā viśvāsa karana kāntāvan ehi (makkāvehi) novī nam, num̆balā ovun pāgā damannaṭa avasthā tibuṇi. eviṭa ovun hētuven nodænuvatvama num̆balāṭa pāpayak ætivannaṭa tibuṇi. (eya makkāva tuḷa siṭi aya aturin) allāh abhimata karana ayaṭa ohugē dayāva tuḷa ohu ætuḷat karanu piṇisaya. ovun (viśvāsa kaḷavun) movungen ven va siṭiyā nam movun aturin vu pratikṣēpa kaḷavunaṭa sæbævin dæḍi dan̆ḍuvamakin api dan̆ḍuvam karannaṭa tibuṇi
